Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Sometimes when teachers didn't provide enough clear information, I would use AI to supplement where they had slacked off in providing necessary feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI has to be taken with a grain of salt, but then again so does teacher feedback so it is just about understanding the strengths and weaknesses of both.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI definitely has to be specifically prompted to receive the kind of feedback desired, whereas teachers already have knowledge of the assessment and subject and are able to use that on the basis of their feedback.
